Class WorkOrdersDAOImplementation

java.lang.Object
com.example.protrack.workorder.WorkOrdersDAOImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkOrdersDAO
public class WorkOrdersDAOImplementation extends Object implements WorkOrdersDAO
Interface to the database relevant to WorkOrder operations, providing abstraction

    • getWorkOrderByCustomerAndDate

      public WorkOrder getWorkOrderByCustomerAndDate(Customer customer, LocalDateTime orderDate)
      Retrieves a WorkOrder based on the specified customer and order date. Since the primary key (workOrderId) is auto-incremented in the database, this method uses a candidate key (customer ID and order date) to retrieve the WorkOrder from the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - the Customer whose work order is to be retrieved
      orderDate - the date the order was placed
      Returns:
      the WorkOrder associated with the specified customer and order date, or null if no matching WorkOrder is found

    • getWorkOrderByMonth

      public List<WorkOrder> getWorkOrderByMonth(Integer month)
      Retrieves a list of WorkOrders placed in the specified month.
      Parameters:
      month - the month (1-12) for which WorkOrders should be retrieved
      Returns:
      a List of WorkOrders placed in the specified month
